scripts.deploy:models: gcloud functions deploy mcp-models --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point mcpModels --region us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:clients: gcloud functions deploy mcp-clients --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point mcpClients --region us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy mcp-health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point mcpHealth --region us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:models && npm run deploy:clients && npm run deploy:health
